group_1.textLeft: Here we are! The new [textBlue:Rumor] is being made@here.
Yup, this is an abandoned amusement park.
Your job, Miss Mighty, will be at this@newly built amusement park here.

group_1.textCenter: You'll be the executioner and manager.

group_1.textLeft: Welcome.
All three Magius members are now here.
Yes.
I came up with the [textBlue:Rumor] of Chelation Land.

group_1.narration: Have you heard? Has anyone told you?@The Rumor of Chelation Land.
You won't wanna leave! No way! And you don't@have to! You can stay as long as you want!
Oh, but, attention please! If it reaches max@capacity, you'll be removed from this world.@It's a hot rumor rolling through Kamihama!

group_1.textRight: An amusement park where you don't want to@leave...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes!
We want you to become the manager there.
We still don't know what kind of amusement@park it should be.
That [textBlue:Rumor] you just heard is about 80ï¼…@complete.
In any case, make it a place where people@want to get together and have fun.
Get rid of anyone who can't fit inside, and@turn them into energy.
That's going to be your job as the manager.
Yup.
They'll be having fun, then suddenly, they'll@vanish from this world.
Energy is created by a shift in people's@emotions.
That energy can be harvested from people@who aren't Magical Girls too, you know.

group_1.textRight: I think the bigger the shift, the more @energia we can collect.

group_1.textLeft: So, try to frighten them as much as you can@before killing them, okay?

group_1.textRight: Will salvation be waiting for me after I@finish this job?

group_1.textLeft: You bet.
Protect the Uwasa from pesky intruders!
Collect plenty of energy!
If you do your job, you can save Magical@Girls from their destiny.
It's the perfect job for the Mightiest@Magical Girl, don't you think?

group_1.textRight: Protect the amusement park Uwasa...@Collect energy...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, as a member of the Wings of the Magius,@as a cog in our wheel...
Turning and turning... Day in and day out...
Just like that big Ferris wheel you can see@over there.

group_1.textRight: Turning and turning, day in, day out...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, leave the thinking and worrying to the@Magius.
Focus on routine work, and forget all about@your worries.

group_1.textCenter: (I don't have to think... I don't have to@worry...)
(If I do as they say, everyone will be@happy...)
(Magical Girls won't have to suffer anymore.)
(If only I had known this sooner.)
(I would've been able to help Mel...)

group_1.narration: I finally found a place where@I feel completely safe.

group_1.textCenter: (That's right... I already knew it when I@said those words.)
(The Wings of the Magius is the only place@I can feel safe.)
If I stay here, I'll be able to find @happiness without worrying so much, right?
